title: Display all party names in the system

requirements.text: Create a new page or section that displays a comprehensive list of all party names in the system, showing each unique party entry with their name prominently displayed
acceptanceCriteria: All party names are displayed in a clear, readable format
Each party appears exactly once in the list
The list is accessible from the main navigation or a dedicated route

requirements.text: Based on the uploaded screenshot showing 'ABC AUTO PARTS Bangesimal' appearing three times with identical details (Phone: N/A, PAN: 0, Due: â‚¹34,920), investigate and resolve any data duplication issues in the party records to ensure each party exists only once in the system
acceptanceCriteria: Duplicate party records are identified and deduplicated
Each unique party appears only once in the database
Payment history and visit records are preserved and correctly associated with the consolidated party record

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, and UI components
Preserve all existing payment and visit history data during any deduplication process
nonGoals: Adding new party fields or metadata beyond name display
Implementing advanced filtering or search beyond existing PartiesPage functionality
Creating data export features for party names
